title: BackJoy Posture Plus | Back Cushion for Lower Back Pain | Sciatica Pain Relief | for Adults (100-300 lbs)
feature: BackJoy SitSmart Posture Plus is an innovative, proven back pain cushion that provides natural, safe and effective back pain relief by optimizing your posture. Perfect as a coccyx seat cushion, office chair cushion, and tailbone relief
Different than our SitSmart Relief and Tractions! BackJoy SitSmart Posture Plus features a comfortable, waterproof EVA foam covering for indoor or outdoor use
Portable Cushion: Easy for travel. Works for car seats, office chairs, hard surface chairs, desk chairs, outdoor surfaces, and driving.

It is important to note that changing your sitting posture can cause temporary discomfort-like going to the gym for the first time. Your body may need time to adjust and relax into the new posture that your BackJoy provides. Please read manual
This orthopedic seat cushion to help lower back posture and relieve lower back pain, tailbone, lumbar pain, and other types of coccyx or back issues.
description: BackJoy SitSmart is an innovative, proven back support cushion that provides natural, safe and effective back pain relief by optimizing your posture - anytime and anywhere you sit. Provides lumbar support, lower back pain relief, and corrects spine posture in cars, office environments and any surface. BackJoy SitSmart Posture Plus features a comfortable, waterproof EVA foam covering for indoor or outdoor use. This coccyx cushion works on any type of seat, including office chairs, car seats, and hard or soft surfaces. Waterproof base and covering provide long-term use. These models include benefits for back pain, back pain relief, posture pain, spinal pain, sciatia pain, lumbar pain, lower neck pain.
